thread.title: Joe S
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Joe S

author: Joe S
title: Joe S
text: Fast, efficient, and a great price. The flowers were perfect, and the recipient was over the moon. I ordered the day before delivery (Feb13th), and was slightly concerned the florists would be overwhelmed with deliveries. Before 10am the next day, the flowers had been delivered. I will *definitely* order with Euroflorist again.
